net.viktorc.detroid.framework.uci

Class Option<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.viktorc.detroid.framework.uci.Option<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type that determines the type of the default value and the allowed values of the option.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Option.ButtonOption, Option.CheckOption, Option.ComboOption, Option.SpinOption, Option.StringOption

    public class Option<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A parameterized type for storing a name, and possibly a default value, minimum and maximum values and a set of allowed values for different setting types.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Option.ButtonOption
      A button option which only has a name and serves as a parameterless command.
      static class  Option.CheckOption
      A check option subclassing Setting with a Boolean type parameter.
      static class  Option.ComboOption
      A combo option with a set of allowed values subclassing Setting with a String type parameter.
      static class  Option.SpinOption
      A spin option with minimum and maximum values subclassing Setting with an Integer type parameter.
      static class  Option.StringOption
      A simple string option subclassing Setting with a String type parameter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<java.util.Set<T>> getAllowedValues()
      Returns an optional set of values a #ComboOption can possibly take on.
      java.util.Optional<T> getDefaultValue()
      Returns the optional default value of the setting.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> getMax()
      Returns the optional maximum value for the setting.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> getMin()
      Returns the optional minimum value for the setting.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name ID of the setting.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name ID of the setting.
        Returns:
        The name ID of the setting.

      • getDefaultValue

        public java.util.Optional<T> getDefaultValue()
        Returns the optional default value of the setting. For a #ButtonOption, it is never present; for all other option types, it is always present.
        Returns:
        The default value of the option.

      • getAllowedValues

        public java.util.Optional<java.util.Set<T>> getAllowedValues()
        Returns an optional set of values a #ComboOption can possibly take on. For all other option types, it is never present.
        Returns:
        The set of allowed values for this option.

      • getMin

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> getMin()
        Returns the optional minimum value for the setting. For option types other than #SpinOption, it is never present.
        Returns:
        The minimum allowed value for this option.

      • getMax

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> getMax()
        Returns the optional maximum value for the setting. For option types other than #SpinOption, it is never present.
        Returns:
        The maximum allowed value for this option.
